rune:rykard.name: Rykard’s Great Rune
effects: Restores 80 HP plus 7% of your total HP upon defeating enemies

rune:morgott.name: Morgott’s Great Rune
rune:morgott.description: Its blessing greatly raises maximum HP.

rune:mohg.name: Mohg’s Great Rune
rune:mohg.description: A Great Rune of the shardbearer Mohg.
effects: Grants a blessing of blood to phantoms

rune:malenia.name: Malenia’s Great Rune
rune:malenia.description: The blessing of this half-rotted rune reduces the healing power of Flask of Crimson Tears.
effects: Attacks dealt after taking damage recover HP.

rune:unborn.name: Great Rune of the Unborn
rune:unborn.description: Perfects those who have been born anew.

rune:phantom.name: Phantom Great Rune
effects: Give blessing of blood to enemies in invaded world
